buildCommand: cd frontend && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && npm install && npm install @rollup/rollup-linux-x64-gnu @esbuild/linux-x64 && npm run generate && cp -r .output/public ../public/ || cp -r dist ../public/ || mkdir -p ../public && find . -type d -name 'public' -not -path '*/\.*' -exec cp -r {}/* ../public/ \;
